briefdescription.para: Time training started; all times are relative to this.
Time the current layer's forward pass started.
Time the current layer's backward pass started.
Time the current weights' optimization pass started.

memberdef.type: std::unordered_map< std::string, std::vector< std::pair< EvalType, EvalType > > >
memberdef.name: m_fp_times

memberdef.type: std::unordered_map< std::string, std::vector< std::pair< EvalType, EvalType > > >
memberdef.name: m_bp_times

memberdef.type: std::unordered_map< std::string, std::vector< std::pair< EvalType, EvalType > > >
memberdef.name: m_opt_times

detaileddescription.para: Called at the beginning of training.
Called at the end of training.
Called when a layer begins forward propagation.
Called when a layer ends forward propagation.
Called when a layer begins backward propagation.
Called when a layer ends backward propagation.

briefdescription.para: Get time relative to the start time.

detaileddescription.para: Record a timeline of training runtime on each rank and output it to a logfile for external processing. The logfile is named timeline.m<model-rank>.<rank>.txt. Each line is a separate event, written as name:start-time:end-time. Times are relative to the beginning of training.
